QuestData.Title: Rerouted!
QuestData.Description: Halt!$b$bOn behalf of the Nijel's Point Guard, I am under orders to send all able-bodied allies to report directly to Corporal Melkins.$b$bI am not authorized to offer any other information.$b$bWhat I can offer is transportation. You are free to use my mount. It will deliver you directly.$b$bDismissed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Officer Jankie wants you to ride her mount to Nijel's Point and speak to Corporal Melkins.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Nijel's Point, $r.$b$bNow, let's see about getting you briefed on our situation here.
